sentences.en: All alcoholic beverages should be rigidly prohibited.
sentences.cn: 应该严禁一切含酒精的饮料.

sentences.en: All the units interlock with one another rigidly.
sentences.cn: 所有的元件严密地连锁在一起.

sentences.en: Glancing over my shoulder, I saw him sitting rigidly on the low stool.
sentences.cn: 我回过头去, 瞥见他僵坐在那张矮凳上.

sentences.en: His gaze was rigidly fixed ahead.
Historically, the consensus was to rigidly guard all source code and strictly govern how it was managed.
sentences.cn: 历史上，共识都将严格地保护所有的源代码，并严谨地支配它如何被管理。

sentences.en: However, the owner wouldn't budge and stood there rigidly.
sentences.cn: 可是摊主无动于衷,直挺挺地站着.

sentences.en: I have to plan my academic work very rigidly and set myself clear objectives.
sentences.cn: 我必须严格地规划我的学业，同时给自己定下明确的目标。

sentences.en: If expectations are rigidly inelastic, we get the case of given expectations.
sentences.cn: 如果结果是完全无弹性的, 就是预期的情况.

sentences.en: It would seem more sensible to apply standards flexibly rather than rigidly.
sentences.cn: 灵活地运用标准比死守标准会显得更合情合理。

sentences.en: Life today is rigidly compartmentalized into work and leisure.
sentences.cn: 当今的生活被严格划分为工作和休闲两部分。

sentences.en: Many writers at this time held rigidly dogmatic views.
sentences.cn: 这时期有很多作家固执己见。

sentences.en: My correspondence happens to be rigidly controlled.
sentences.cn: 我的信件恰巧受到严格控制.

sentences.en: She stood rigidly and stared into the room.
sentences.cn: 她直直地站在那里，凝视着屋内。

sentences.cn: 自儿童时起即已开始有严格的课程设置.

sentences.en: The play, whose style is rigidly formal, is typical of the period.
sentences.cn: 这剧本是那个时期的典型作品, 风格拘谨刻板.

sentences.en: We must keep rigidly the recipe.
sentences.cn: 我们必须严格按照配方行事.
